EmailTemplate.description: Data Services - Quickstart- Request Excel Files
EmailTemplate.name: Data Services - Quickstart- Request Excel Files
EmailTemplate.subject: Data Services - Quickstart - Request Excel Files
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Data Conversion Case # {!Case.CaseNumber}
Dear {!Contact.Name},
We have received your company file(s) for data conversion. Unfortunately, the file(s) we have received is/are not compatible with our data conversion tools. Due to third party software limitations, we can only perform a manual conversion of your data by importing from excel files. Please follow the steps below to export and upload Excel files to us to complete your request.
Reports/Lists to export to Excel (.XLSX/.XLS/.CSV)
Chart of Accounts List (Please include the account numbers and account type) Customer List (Include all columns) Vendor List (Include all columns) Employee List (Include all columns) Item/Inventory Master List (Should also include the Income account, Cost of Sales account and Expense account) Aged Receivables Report (Should also include Invoice date & Due date columns, Amount Due). Aged Payable Report (Should also include Invoice date & Due date columns, Amount Due). General Ledger Trial Balance Report. Balance Sheet Report.
For report numbers 6,7,8 and 9 please generate the reports by Last Date of Transaction/Closing Date. Please make sure to check the Show Headers in Excel sheet radio button when exporting these reports.
Ready to upload?
Click the following link http://intuitb2b.force.com/FileExchange (If the link doesn't work, copy and paste it into your browser's address bar). Enter the information and click the I have read and agree to the Terms of Servicecheck box. Click Sign In. In the Customer File Upload section, click Add. Browse your computer for your company file (.QBW, .QBB, .QBM, .QBA, .QPB, .QPT, .QB201X, .QBBMac). Once found, select it and click Open. Click Start Upload.
The upload site will inform you when the upload has been completed.
Note: If you have multiple files to upload, they must be uploaded separately.
Note :
Your QuickBooks file will have only the data from the above mentioned reports. Any additional historical data or reports not included in the list above will not be converted. The ending balance of the accounts as of the trial balance report will be entered as opening balance of the accounts.
Looking for a status update?
We recommend visiting the “Data Services Case Status Information” page. You will need the information you received from your welcome email with “SBG Data Services” in the subject line. It contains the information you’ll need to log in and see where your case is at in the recovery process.
You can also leave a message directly to the specialist working on your case, or provide additional information.
Thank you, Intuit Data Services
This is an automated email. Please do not reply directly as you will not receive a response.
